Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students using a string telephone to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string to help the two students communicate.
The student can label the key parts of the device, such as the cups and the string, that are needed for communication.
The student can show how the device only uses the materials provided, typical of a string telephone.
The student can demonstrate through their drawing how this communication device works as a solution to the problem of talking over long distances without modern technology.
The student can illustrate that the device allows the transfer of information using sound.
